medals.name: Cross of Valor
medals.description: Awarded for exceptional bravery in combat.

medals.name: Marksman Medal
medals.description: For achieving a high number of accurate kills or suppressive fire.

medals.name: Defender Medal
medals.description: For outstanding performance in defending critical points.

medals.name: Logistics Excellence Medal
medals.description: For consistently providing supplies and materials to the frontlines.

medals.name: Supply Chain Hero
medals.description: For organizing large-scale deliveries to multiple regions.

medals.name: War Strategist Medal
medals.description: For planning and executing a successful operation.

medals.name: Mentor Badge
medals.description: For training new players and helping them integrate into the regiment.

medals.name: Saboteur Medal
medals.description: For successful sabotage missions behind enemy lines.

medals.name: Service Ribbon
medals.description: For long-standing service and loyalty to the regiment.

medals.name: War Veteran Medal
medals.description: For participation in multiple wars or campaigns.

medals.name: Tank Commander Ribbon
medals.description: For excellence in operating and commanding tanks.

medals.name: Recruiter Ribbon
medals.description: For recruiting and onboarding new members to the regiment.

medals.name: Mammon Rusher
medals.description: Awarded to players who have demonstrated extraordinary bravery and skill in breaching enemy fortifications with Mammon Grenades in critical battles. This medal honors their relentless determination and contributions to the offensive efforts.

medals.name: Frontline Medic Medal
medals.description: Recognizes individuals who have risked their lives to save others on the battlefield. Awarded for exceptional dedication in providing medical aid under fire, reviving fallen comrades, and ensuring the survival of the regiment in critical moments.
